document_data.caption: The [[Arena of War (game)|AoW:G]] spell card.
document_data.name: Insect Plague
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Insect plague''''' was a [[druid]] [[evocation]] that allowed the caster to disassociate his or her body into a cloud of flying insects controlled by the caster's consciousness.
{{Stub/Spell}}
